title: The Lie
description: Try to remember the moment when all the stupid innocent things you thought about life and love, all the things you thought mattered, all the things you thought were true...try to remember when they all turned out to be lies. -KyleI never thought anything Kyle and I were doing would lead to this....I was clearly incorrect. -BrettWe all get what we deserve. I know I did. -Heather
author: Chad Kultgen
